name: Pure Chess PS Vita
description:
Download this trial of Pure Chess® to experience chess the way it's meant to be played, in stunning high definition.

Play against two differently skilled computer opponents using the sumptuous wooden Staunton chess pieces, in a stylish penthouse apartment setting.

If you like what you see, you can unlock the full game and test your strategic prowess against a variety of more skillful opponents, or challenge up to 8 of your friends wherever they are in the world using the Play By Mail mode.

The full game features:

• Staunton, Checker, and Williams chess sets created with stunning detail and precision
• Museum, Penthouse, and Library locations beautifully portrayed
• Comprehensive tutorial that teaches you basic, intermediate, and advanced chess techniques
• 3 Tournaments to test your tactics
• 100 Bonus chess puzzles to ponder over
• Track your ELO and Tournament ratings in the ranking boards

Some functions and features may not be available on PlayStation TV.

1-2 player(s)
Network Features
16384KB Minimum
Touchscreen
Rear Touch Pad
Dual Analog Sticks
